content: contains a couple of more advanced techniques such as italian bind-off and shortrows the pattern should be manageable even for a relatively new knitter who is willing to try new methods wisteria sweater chunky is knitted from the top down with a round yoke where the increases are included in the pattern after the pattern on the yoke is knitted it is divided into sleeves and body and then reverse row are knitted to make the sweater higher at the neck the body is finished with wide rib double knit and italian bind-off the sleeves are knitted with increases to give a slight balloon effect before being reduced to narrow rib around the wrist this gives a nice effect and makes it easy to roll up the sleeves of the sweater when needed the ribbed edges on the sleeves are also finished with double knitting and italian bind-off the gray sweater in the pictures in the pattern is knitted in isager eco soft in the color e2s together with camarose målestråle in the color 9004 askegrå the white sweater is knitted in drops air together with drops kid silk both in the color 01 natur **sizes ** xxs xs s m l xl 2xl **fits chest circumference ** 80 85 90 95 100 110 120 cm **circumference body ** 93 98 103 107 113 123 132 cm **total length ** 55 56 57 58 60 62 64 cm **gauge ** 14 stitches per 10 cm on needle 7 0 mm us10 75 in stockinette stitch **suggested needles ** 6 mm us 10 circular needle 40 cm and 80 cm and double pointed needles for ribbing circular needle 40 60 og 80 cm and maybe also souble pointed needles for arms 7 mm us 10 75 for sweater **suggested yarn ** isager eco soft 50 g = 125 m and camarose månestråle 25 g = 200 m the two yarns are held together **estimated yarn quantity ** 300 350 350 400 400 450 500 g isager eco soft og 100 100 125 12 5 125 150 150 g camarose månestråle **level of difficulty ** 3/5 this is a digital knitting pattern that you will receive as a pdf file the pattern is only available in the sizes i found test knitters for but i can gladly upgrade it to additional sizes if you are willing to test knit you will receive the pattern in all available languages ​​ norwegian english
